iebaker.neon.world

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • iebaker.neon.world.Edge

  • public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object
    Edge is a class which represents an edge of the Graph object. An edge is directed (undirected edges in the graph are represented by a pair of Edges, one in each direction. Edges have a tail (starting end), and a head (final end). Edges can be decorated in a manner similar to Vertices.
